featured.text: Jack was given the rare _____ of using the president’s office, which made others quite jealous.

definition.zh_def: 嫉妒的，對他人的成功或擁有感到不滿或不安。
definition.en_def: Feeling or showing envy of someone or their achievements and advantages.
definition.example: She felt jealous when she saw her friend receiving praise for the project.
